A Travel Journal

The One Where Sara Gets Sick

13 September 2017 by Saralee Morales

The One Where Ryan Becomes King of the South

11 September 2017 by Saralee Morales

The One Where We Bought Bad Cheese

09 September 2017 by Saralee Morales

The One Where We Get to Spain

08 September 2017 by Saralee Morales

Five Weeks Abroad is:


  • Ryan » A software engineer with wanderlust who convinced his job to let him work abroad for 5 weeks
  • Sara » A pragmatic nurse who did not think this was possible
  • Penny » A majestic pug along for the ride hoping to find tapas on Spanish sidewalks
